name: WasteStation
description:
This game is a high score/beat your friend based game.

You eject trash from the I.S.S to earth and you have to land it to the chutes otherwise it sticks to the planet. You cant let this stack of trash hit the I.S.S otherwise you will lose. The I.S.S orbits future earth, you will spin faster the better your score.

//The game is still in beta so any suggestions will be taken on board and be appreciated//

If anyone does decide to donate, Thank you very much, this will go towards buying licences for distribution platforms.

//UPDATE// We understand some people had a rather large bug when first entering the game. We have fixed the bug, if it continues please let us know.
